dinosaurs.name: Tyrannosaurus rex
dinosaurs.interesting_fact: One of the largest land predators ever.

dinosaurs.name: Stegosaurus
dinosaurs.interesting_fact: Known for its distinctive double row of large bony plates on its back.

dinosaurs.name: Triceratops
dinosaurs.interesting_fact: Characterized by its three facial horns and a bony frill at the back of its head.

dinosaurs.name: Velociraptor
dinosaurs.interesting_fact: Popularly known for their portrayal in the Jurassic Park movies.

dinosaurs.name: Brachiosaurus
dinosaurs.interesting_fact: Known for its long neck and large size.

dinosaurs.name: Pterodactyl
dinosaurs.interesting_fact: Not a dinosaur, but a type of flying reptile.
